text: (ai rasool se) poochho to ki jo zeenat (ke saazon saamaan) aur khaane kee saaph sutharee cheezen khuda ne apane bando ke vaaste paida kee hain kisane haraam kar dee tum khud kah do ki sab paaqeeza cheeze qayaamat ke din un logon ke lie khaas hain jo duniya kee (zara see) zindagee mein eemaan laate the ham yoon apanee aayaten samajhadaar logon ke vaaste taphaseeladaar bayaan karaten hain
